name: 李鎮宇
objective:
This course introduces the methods essential to business research. 
In my session, the students will be introduced to data analysis using R. Whether you decide to pursue it or not, the introduction will be helpful for understanding data analysis techniques and help you interpret results in quantitative research papers.
schedule:
This course will be team-taught by various professors.
1) Installation, basic input
2) Statistical tests
3) Regression models (using and presentation)
scorePolicy:
For my session,
grading will be based on weekly homework.
materials: Examples and codes to be shared in class.

name: 黃增隆
objective:
主要內容包含：企業研究的本質、研究流程、研究問題與假設、文獻評論、資料收集、操作性定義、測量、理論架構模型化、研究設計、量化與質化研究、個案研究法、資料分析與解釋、研究報告撰寫。
The course mainly discusses concepts of business research methods. The contents will include following topics：（1）the nature of business research, （2）elements of research and research process, （3）research problem and hypothesis,（4）literature review, （5）research design, （6）research proposal, （7）case study, （8）analysis and the interpretation of data, （9）quantitative and qualitative research,(10) research report.
schedule:
週次	授課老師	內容
4	黃增隆	文獻回顧的技巧與方式：以行銷領域為例 
5	黃增隆	研究方法設計：以行銷領域為例
6	黃增隆	資料的分析與解讀：以行銷領域為例
scorePolicy:
出席狀況 40% 
課堂討論 30%
課堂報告 30%
materials: 所有教材來自相關學術期刊.
consultation: 同學可以透過 email 方式事前預約諮詢。電子郵件: blessing@ntut.edu.tw
